title: Carlsbad Caverns National Park: Mosses and Liverworts
body: Mosses and Liverworts        The park’s diversity of tiny plants is displayed. Among them are the flat, turquoise-colored liverworts and the bright green mosses. This picture also shows lichens, algae and spikemoss. NPS Photo by Renée West       The park’s mosses and liverworts are part of the living soil crusts, as described under Lichens.
